mapper.update: update email_logs set company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email_campaign_id = #{emailCampaignId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, onboarding_id = #{onboardingId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, to_email = #{toEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, subject = #{subject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, provider = #{provider,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, error_message = #{errorMessage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, queued_at = #{queuedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, sent_at = #{sentAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, template_code = #{templateCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where email_log_id = #{emailLogId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select email_log_id, company_id, email_campaign_id, onboarding_id, user_id, to_email, subject, provider, status, error_message, queued_at, sent_at, template_code from email_logs where email_log_id = #{emailLogId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select email_log_id, company_id, email_campaign_id, onboarding_id, user_id, to_email, subject, provider, status, error_message, queued_at, sent_at, template_code from email_logs
